titles.title: Sing The Wondrous Love Of Jesus

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

authors.author: Eliza Edmunds Hewitt | Emily D. Wilson

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Sing the wondrous
Love of Jesus
Sing His mercy
And His grace
In the mansions
Bright and blessed
He'll prepare for us a place

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
When we all
(echo: when we all)
Get to heaven
What a day of rejoicing that will be
(echo: that will be)
When we all
(echo: when we all)
See Jesus
We'll sing and shout the victory

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
While we walk
The pilgrim pathway
Clouds will overspread
The sky
But when trav'ling
Days are over
Not a shadow not a sigh

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let us then be
True and faithful
Trusting serving ev'ry day
Just one glimpse
Of Him in glory
Will the toils
Of life repay

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Onward to the
Prize before us
Soon His beauty
We'll behold
Soon the pearly gates
will open
We shall tread
the streets of gold
